content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to have you interested in my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great place to live. So, what price were you thinking for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your kind words, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Considering its location and amenities, I believe a price between 1000 and 1500 Euros per month would be reasonable. What do you think?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your perspective, Maryam. The location and amenities of the apartment are indeed quite attractive. However, I must be honest with you. Due to the current market conditions and the fact that this is a newly built apartment, I was hoping for a higher price. Something closer to 2000 Euros per month would be more in line with my expectations. What do you say to that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Heine, I appreciate your candor. While the market conditions are certainly a factor, I believe that a price of 1500 Euros per month would be more reasonable for this apartment. This would be a fair compromise that takes into account both the current market and the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to meet me at 1500 Euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Maryam, but 1500 Euros per month is below my asking price. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the quality and location of this apartment, and who is willing to pay a premium for it. If you're unable to meet my asking price of 2000 Euros per month, I'm afraid I'll have to look for another tenant who can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Heine, and I respect your decision. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're asking for is higher than what I'm willing to pay. I'm sorry, but I'll have to consider other options. Thank you for your time.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Maryam. If you change your mind or are open to discussing other terms, please let me know. Good luck in your search for a suitable apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your assistance and understanding. I'll keep your offer in mind, but for now, I'll continue my search. Good day to you.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Good day to you as well, Maryam. I hope you find what you're looking for in your apartment search. If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything else, feel free to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I may reach out if I have any questions or if something changes. Goodbye for now.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Goodbye, Maryam. I hope our paths cross again in the future. If you need anything, don't hesitate to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
